name: Mara Holt
personality: Patient, grounded, knows every ridge and trail around Goodsprings.
description: Mara grew up tracking coyotes and bighorners through the hills. She teaches newcomers how to survive without getting themselves killed.
questHooks: Offers a basic survival lesson for new players.
Mentions hearing a faint hum near the old well at night.
Says a stranger buried something behind the saloon years ago.
